<junit f=
ailureproperty=3D"test.failed" printsummary=3D"true" fork=3D"yes">
<jvmarg =
value=3D"-Xdebug"/>
<jvmarg value=3D"-Xrunjdwp:transport=3Ddt_socket,addres=
s...
If no jvm arguments defined everything works fine.

Thanks!
